html: 4.19.17  7:23 pm   So, I've been asking questions for a while, but I want to make this clear. Ever since I watched History of Japan, I've been going through your website like an archaeologist and feel like I know like 80% more about you than everyone else. It also helps me figure out which extremely relevant questions to ask. So what is your view on this?
